plugin.name: markdown-blog
plugin.author: Andy Hawkes
plugin.title: Markdown Blog Plugin
plugin.description: This plugin adds a Markdown-powered blog and content editor to your Grails app. Edit your dynamic blog posts and pages with a client-side Markdown editor (EpicEditor). You can then customize the appearance with your own Grails views, map your posts/pages to whatever location you want with UrlMappings, and so on. Check out the project documentation for more info!
